mapper.insert: Insert into MY_ITEM (id, member_ID, item_ID, wish) values (seq_My_Item.nextval, #{memberId}, #{itemId},#{wish} )
Insert into MY_ROOM (id, member_ID, item_ID, wish) values (seq_My_Item.nextval, #{memberId}, #{itemId},#{wish} )
Insert into MY_ROOM (id, member_ID, floor, wallpaper,bed,closet,desk,walldeco) values (seq_My_Room.nextval, #{id}, 1,11,21,31,41,51 )
mapper.select: select m.member_ID, m.item_ID as id, m.wish,i.category, i.name, i.price from MY_ITEM m Inner Join ITEM i ON m.item_id = i.id where category=#{category}
